p: In order to perform different antioxidant activities, the S. rebaudiana leaf extracts were prepared by drying the leaves from different treatments at 100 °C in drying oven, and then taking 0.1 g of their fine powder that was dissolved in 500 μL of dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO). It was vortexed for 5 min and then sonicated for 30 min. Centrifugation was performed at 10,000 rpm for 15 min and the supernatant was stored for performing antioxidant activities.
